C

calculatePrice() - Method in class model.Transaction
Calculates the total price of this order.
calculateTicketPrice(Ticket) - Static method in class operator.PricingOperator
This methods helps to calculate the price of a movie Ticket based on the following factors: Age, CinemaClass, Day of Week, MovieType (eg 3D or Blockbuster)
calculateTID() - Method in class model.Transaction
Finds the transaction ID of this order.
ChildrenPriceTicket - Class in model
Represents a child ticket that can be bought by moviegoers.
ChildrenPriceTicket(Seat, ShowTime) - Constructor for class model.ChildrenPriceTicket
Creates a new child ticket with the given seat and showtime.
Cinema - Class in model
Represents a cinema found within a cineplex.
Cinema(Cineplex, CinemaClassType, int, SeatLayout) - Constructor for class model.Cinema
Creates a new cinema in the given cineplex, with the given class, code and seat layout.
CinemaClassType - Enum Class in enums
 
Cineplex - Class in model
Represents a cineplex containing cinemas.
Cineplex(String, ArrayList<Cinema>) - Constructor for class model.Cineplex
Creates a new cineplex with the given name and cinemas.
